11.content:
The peace of the lightless room was only interrupted by a lone snore, muffled by the wrinkled covers of a certain 16 year-old ninja. His face was of the most blissfull relief, a large grin crossing his face near the whiskers, with both the bed's cover and his own, messy golden hair shielding his eyes from the light outside. Muttering in his sleep, he continued to twist, hugging the cushion so much, he bend his body, leaving a round rump to burst from the covers in all its half-covered glory. Out of the bright-orange pajama pants, came many inches of fresh blue cotton, ending with a thick tag attached to the waistband's very center. Had he been awake, he would have thought twice about shacking his hips as he did not on his sleep and less so now that his mother's angry steps could be heard outside the room, drawing closer by the second...

"One day, just one day waking up on time..." hissed a tall woman of endless, crimson hair as she crossed the distance between her and her son in a mere two steps "Naruto, this is your final warning!" she growled, yet the blond still snored, the large smile on his face almost stopping Kushina's finger as they moved to the ninja's exposed underwear "He has to learn, one way or another" she hissed, clenching her hand around the fabric "Naruto....WAKE UP!"

"AHIEEEEEEEE!!!" and so, Naruto Uzumaki, with his bright-blue eyes almost bursting out of his sockets, was launched off the bed, screaming and flailing around as he dangled by a growing carpet of blue cotton "OW! MUUUM!" he whined, trying to pull his pants back up to recover the little dignity he had left "I told you I hate alarm-wedgies!"

"The day you wake up early in your own, you will stop getting then. And besides, I am the one paying for your underwear!" snapped Kushina as she continued to bounce her teen soon with the ease of practice, until his pajama pants had fallen with the little pride he had managed to save "I can´t believe a son of mine acting like this..."

"T-Tsume-san told me you were not different" tried Naruto, before letting out a high-pitched scream as she was lifted a few more feet into the air, the cotton so far in, he could almost taste his own hanging wedgie!

"I will also have words with her soon..." muttered Kushina while fighting a blush "Now..."delivering one last yank, Kushina released her son's waistband, grinning as it snapped right over his stunned eyes, trapping the teen in a brutal atomic that saw Naruto twitching on the floor, with his hands clawing at the waistband in pain "...get dressed. You have a long day ahead of you"

Naruto whimpered and slowly rolled his eyes towards the drawer. Crawling his way there, he found, to his dismay, that his underwear reserve was in a new low. Yet he could not risk igniting his mother's ire again. Sighing, He took a closer look at the choices at his disposal

113.content:
Naruto groaned as he took in the sight that was his last clean pair of non-destoryed underwear. A pair of pink granny panties with teddie's borrowed from Hinata. His face flushed bright red as his lack of choices fully dawned on him. "Ugh, why haven't I given these back yet?" The young ninja could still remember the unfortunate circumstances that left him with these.

Flashback/2 Days Ago


"Ow." Naruto grumbled out as he landed on the ground of his usual training area.

"Uh, so-sorry about that N-Naruto." Hinata said from the tree branch above him where she had just cut his underwear free.

"It's okay." Naruto called back while reaching his hand into the back of his pants and digging the remains of his now destroyed tighty whities out of his backside. As for why he was up there in the first place, well, that was Ino's doing. The wedgie giving girl had left hanging from the tree by his briefs about a half hour earlier with the promise of coming back later to see if he had gotten down yet. He was just fortunate that Hianta had come along and found him because his underwear hadn't seemed like it would break anytime soon and he doubted that Ino's method of getting him down would have been as gentle as Hinata's.

After jumping down to join him, the shy girl asked, "A-are you sure you're okay?"

Having now righted himself back onto his feet, Naruto brushed some dirt off his clothes before saying, "Aside from needing to ditch this underwear, yeah.." He let out a sigh before continuing. "As much as I hate the wedgies, it just feels weird not having any underwear on."

Wanting to give her crush as much help as she could, Hinata made a rather unusual suggestion." W-ell, if you really need a pair to wear, I cou-ould give y-you one of the spares that I carry in my pack." Her own wedgie troubles had led her to carry spare panties around for when she needed them.

At the time, Naruto hadn't seen too many problems with saying yes. he could quickly head home and put on a new pair of briefs pretty easily after wearing Hinata's panties. And that's exactly what he did.

End Flashback


Now though, it was a seriously problem. The young blonde could only imagine the humiliation he would face if anyone caught on that he was wearing panties. Especially, these panties. And given the amount of wedgies he usually receives, it was only a matter of time until these panties were being pulled up his butt for everyone to see. "Alright, I'll just tell mom I need some new underwear during breakfast, she'll give me some money to buy some new ones, and then I'll get some new underwear on before anyone can find out about these." His mom new he hated going commando, and would likely not wedgie and chance ruining his underwear him before he could get more if he told her he was wearing his last pair. "Yeah, that'll work."

Stripping off his pajamas and wedgied underwear, he started putting on Hinata's teddy bear panties. As embarrassing as it was to have them on again, he couldn't deny that they felt extremely comfortable. Is that why Hinata always wears these? he wondered as he put on the rest of his usual orange attire.

15 Minutes Later


"Thanks mom." said Naruto his mother handed him the money he needed to stock up on more underwear.

"Just be sure to get a lot, I think we, or rather I, will be putting some of them to good use when you get back." The blonde gulped at that as he saw the wicked look in his mother's eye. While she usually had no problem getting him new underwear, having had her own experiences with wedgies when she was his age, she also liked to use up some of it giving him a few wedgies herself.

"Um, right." And with that, he walked out the door and set out to get some new underwear before anyone could discover the panties he was stuck wearing. Unfortunately, he would not be so lucky.
113.title: Panties for Naruto!

1131.content:
With all of his dignity on the line, Naruto was in hurry to quickly get some new underwear to replace Hinata's panties. Unfortunately, this rush meant that he wasn't paying much attention to his surroundings as he ran through the streets. Given the early hour, that wasn't the dumbest thing he could be doing. No too many people were out yet and most of the streets were empty at the moment.

However, as he rounded the next corner, Naruto found himself running straight into someone and promptly found himself tumbling to the ground as the two of them both let out an "Ah!" in the collision.

Letting out an annoyed groan, Naruto began to pick himself back up when he heard the other person's voice. "Watch where you're going you..." The voice stopped as its owner recognized the person in front of her, and the orange-wearing ninja froze as he recognized the voice. "Well, hello Naruto." The girl sounded very pleased now.

Oh man, this is not good!

Naruto easily recognized the voice of the girl who had for so long been the village's number 1 wedgie-giver: Ino Yamanaka.

Panicking, Naruto began to scramble away, only to suddenly feel the blonde girl's hand grabbing the waistband of his panties tugging the pink cotton out of his pants. "Ah!"

For a moment, there was complete silence as Ino took in the sight of Naruto's underwear until... "A-are these... Haha. Oh no way! Hahaha, I can't eve-haha!" Any further attempts and speaking were ended by her laughter. The sudden reveal that Naruto was wearing panties, panties that looked a lot like the pairs worn by her other favorite wedgie victim was far too amusing for the young woman. Looks like those two have more in common than I thought.

I, I can explain!" Naruto said frantically, all the while Ino still kept her grip on his panties while he blushed furiously.

Stifling down her laughter enough to speak, she began, "Explain why you're wearing panties that look like they came right out of Hinata's collection? Okay sure. This oughta be good." Giving the panties a good tug and elicting another gasp from the poor boy, she added "But the longer you take, the more I pull on these pretty little panties of yours."

And so Naruto hurriedly disclosed the details of the circumstances leading to his current predicament while his tormentor tugged his panties a quarter of the way up his back. His story ending when he bumped into her only a minute or two ago.

"Ugh, and th-that's what happened."

"Hmmm, well, guess I was wrong. That story wasn't as fun as I expected it to be." She stopped tugging on the panties, causing Naruto to sigh in relief as he thought she was getting bored. However, the girl suddenly smiled and said, "Oh well, I
ll just have to play with these.

"Ahhhh!" Naruto's panick returned as he felt her yanking harder on his panties. Crap, people are gonna come through here soon. I can't let more people see me like this. Hoping to get out of his predicament, Naruto tried bargaining. "Pl-please Ino, if y-ou -AH- just let me go get some new underwear first, I promise I'll let you have yo- EEE!- fun afterward!" He hated offering to actually just let her wedgie him, but it could at least mitigate his humiliation.

The girl's tugging stopped as she thought. "Hmmmm...."

12.content:
"There are times when I wish I was an only child..." the voice came from a closet inside the Sabukono residence, tall and wide enough to keep at least half of a hundred clothes together...or a certain older sibling of the Kazekage.

By all intents and purposes, Temari felt like she should not be in this kind of situation. She was not only the older sibling of the ruler of the sand village, but also a highly-trained jounin, a veteran fighter and also, a gorgeous, 21 year-old woman with the toned, athletic figure of a model...a model with a bouncing, bubble-butt which jiggled after every step she gave, but a model nevertheless! Since when were women like her kept in closets with wire around their arms and their last pair of baby-blue granny panties with clouds snapped over their noses by their brothers?! Their YOUNGER brothers to be more precise!

"When I get out of this, I will show them..." she hissed, yet deep inside, she still had her doubts. Like she had said before, she was an expert ninja, but that only seemed to make her situation that much worse "Suna's wedgie queen" they called her, and not because she was particularly good at giving. The crack between her twin soccers had seen more pairs of panties stuffed into itself than any other in the village "Maybe I just need a break" she whispered to herself.

Yes, maybe a journey to a nearby hidden village like Konoha. There was no way her bad luck would follow her to a place like that!

"And maybe, this time I will be the one giving" she smirked. With that said, there was still the matter of getting out of there, grabbing a fresh pair of underpants, going to the Kazekage's tower without getting a wedgie and THEN ask her brother for permission.

She fell three times before her legs came back to life, pushing her off the ground and also giving her a deeper wedgie at the same time. Biting her lower lip hard, Temari used her round bottom to push the closet doors open. She bursted into her own room, panting and whining as each step only pushed the fabric deeper into her ass.

"Panties...where are you?"

122.content:
Now free from her closet, and eager to get her panties off her head and get her trip out of Suna set up, Temari began wiggling in an attempt to loosen the wire holding her arms at her sides. "Come on. Come on." While it was beginning to work, the motions were also grinding her panties deeper into her ass by the second. "Ugh, come on already!" At long last, the wire loosened up enough around her left arm that she was able to pull it free and begin removing the wire altogether. "Finally!"

With her arms free, the kunoichi immediately reach them up to her head and started prying her waistband off her face. With some difficulty, she finally manged to get it off. She gasped out as the feeling of her underwear tearing into her backside finally lessened. reaching under skirt, Temari began pulling the material out of her backside before removing the stretched out panties altogether and tossing them in the trash. "Alright, just need another pair and I can go see Gaara about a vacation from all this."


Unfortunately, the young woman didn't exactly have many left left to choose from as her wardrobes panty supply had mostly been destroyed over the two weeks. Maybe I should try and find some more durable, or at least stretchier, underwear when I get to Konoha. she thought while despairing at seeing that her only current option was an embarrassing pair of pink, granny panties with cute ferrets. Underwear in Suna wasn't exactly made with wedgie endurance in mind. A problem that often left Temari running out of panties and forcing her to buy whichever ones she could at the time. Even the more embarrassing ones when low on cash or when anything less humiliating had already been sold. After putting her new panties on, the girl set out to the kazekage tower to see her youngest (and most intimidating) sibling.

Mentally, the woman began forming a check list of what to do after seeing Gaara:
1. Avoid any "goodbye" wedgies before the trip.
2. Buy new underwear for the trip.
3. Pack bags.
4. Pack food and water.

Unfortunately for her, there were still a few wedgie problems for her in Suna.
